figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Several multi-omics approaches combining genomic, transcriptomic, proteomic, and spatial imaging data from bone marrow biopsy and/or peripheral blood samples.

claims.sentence: Finally, the integration of single-cell techniques with multi-omics approaches (Figure 1) will be able to transform our understanding of the biology of DS leukemogenesis.
